subject: Personal Finance
title: Bankruptcy Explained
description: A short lesson to help you apply Bankruptcy Explained.

hook.text: Bankruptcy sounds like financial death. In reality, it's a legal reset button.

buildup.text: US bankruptcy law exists to give people a fresh start when debts become truly unpayable.

discovery.text: Chapter 7 wipes out most debts but may require selling assets. Chapter 13 creates a repayment plan.

twist.text: Bankruptcy stays on your credit report for 7-10 years, but recovery starts immediately after filing.

climax.text: Famous people who went bankrupt include Walt Disney, Henry Ford, and Abraham Lincoln.

punchline.text: Bankruptcy is an ending and a beginning.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of bankruptcy law?
options: To give people a fresh start from unpayable debts
